editor.name: Name
editor.nameError: Please, enter a name for the workout.
editor.error: You should add at least one exercise or superset.

editor.supersetSetsWarning: Warning: adding or removing sets will reflect in the sets of the rest of the exercises of the superset. Removing any set will reflect in removing the last set of the rest of the exercises. Adding a set will reflect in adding a copy of the last set of each of the other exercises in their corresponding exercises.
editor.supersetRestingTimeWarning: Warning: changing the resting time will modify the resting time of the rest of the exercises of the superset.
editor.errorAdd: There are errors in the new exercise. Please, correct them before adding the exercise.
editor.errorSave: There are errors in the exercise. Please, correct them before saving the exercise.

setter.error: You must either use an existing exercise or create a new one.

new.name: Name
new.nameError: Please, enter a name for the exercise.

warning.title: Warning
warning.text: Are you sure you want to delete this exercise? This action cannot be undone and it will delete this exercise in all the workouts that has it and, if a workout has only this exercise, that workout will be deleted as well.

editor.empty: There are not exercises in this superset yet.
editor.error: Supersets must contain at least one exercise.

editor.title: Sets
editor.weightError: Weight must be a positive number greater or equal to 0.
editor.repetitionsError: Reps must be a positive integer greater or equal to 1.

abandonWorkoutDialog.title: Warning
abandonWorkoutDialog.text: Are you sure you want to leave the workout? You are going to loose your progress in this session.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.weightUnit: Choose what weight unit you want to see in the app (changing it won't convert the already input weights)
configuration.timerSound: Play a sound when a timer is up

deleteDialog.title: Warning
deleteDialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete this {{whatToDelete}}? This action cannot be undone.

timeEditorDialog.title: Change time
timeEditorDialog.error: Please, enter a valid time of at least 1 second.
